1528300.name: Mythic Zombies
1528300.description:
We're releasing a completely rebuilt version later this year with exciting upgrades, and it won't cost you a thing if you own the game! Crafted by a solo developer coming in this free update. Class system Who you pick will matter, base building element and quests - Right now this is only one person making this game

WARNING! Videos Below Are Of The Rework That Is Coming Soon! These Videos Do NOT Reflect In-Game Gameplay Yet!
In-game Map Maker video here, Bare In Mind, It Is still Been Worked On, So More Will Be Added


Testing New Bosses And Zombies


Slow-Mo Power Up



Warning! Anything Below is about the game as it stands right now

Please also note a controller will work with this game but only once in a game. it will not work in menus.


Mythic Zombies is a round-based zombie game, where you and up to 7 mates (8-player co-op) are tasked with surviving as many rounds as you can of never-ending zombies and buy Doors, Guns and power-ups to help you in your task, Each round will become hard and hard as you climb the levels with more zombies spawning.




Free DLC and no Microtransactions means you will never be left behind. That's Right, We will be supporting the game with free DLC, And we will never have any Microtransactions.

But Why?
As Gamers, We understand that paying for a game even more than just to play any DLC is truly frustrating and can sometimes leave people behind and stop them from playing with their buddies, This is why We will support the game with Free Updates and DLC so we know you can play the way you want to.


Every map that comes to Mythic Zombies will be 100% Free, We will never charge for maps, We plan to have around 20 maps when the game comes out of early access.



From Day one Mythic Zombies will support Single-player, LAN And Online, So play with your mates, Sit back and relax with single-player, You don't even need to be connected online to play single-player so just like the old days, load up the game and start killing zombies.


Within the first six months the game has been out we plan to have all zombie and player characters changed as well as full mod support, XP system and guns added. We also plan to update a lot of our 3D models as well.

With each update, we plan to add at least one map and gun.
